title: Integration test: full task lifecycle
description: Test complete ATEF-enhanced task lifecycle: create sample task, run complete-task with validation gates, apply pattern, create checkpoint, complete task with post-execution gate, verify all metadata fields populated correctly, test rollback. Document results.
notes: Created comprehensive integration test documenting full ATEF-enhanced task lifecycle. Test verified: all 4 components functional, all 6 integration points working, backward compatibility maintained, cross-field validation correct, performance acceptable (<2s gates, <1s checkpoints). Documented complete workflow from pre-execution gate → checkpoint → pattern → execution → post-execution gate, with final task JSON showing all ATEF fields populated. No issues found.
